trait_fixation_notes: Non-shattering: 1000-3000 gen; larger grain: 500-1500 gen; free-threshing: 500-2000 gen; reduced dormancy: 500-1000 gen
key_references: Purugganan & Fuller 2009; Allaby et al. 2017; Thuillet et al. 2005; Haudry et al. 2007

trait_fixation_notes: tb1 (single stalk): <500 gen; tga1 (naked kernels): 3700+ gen; non-shattering: <1000 gen; kernel rows: 1000-5000 gen
key_references: Matsuoka et al. 2002; Tenaillon et al. 2004; Wright et al. 2005; Ramos-Madrigal et al. 2016

trait_fixation_notes: Reduced fear: 10-40 gen; floppy ears: 8-30 gen; curly tails: 10-25 gen; piebald: 8-20 gen; size: 100-500 gen
key_references: Larson & Fuller 2014; Freedman et al. 2014; Trut et al. 2009; Wilkins et al. 2014

trait_fixation_notes: Body size reduction: 800-1000 gen; docility: 50-200 gen; polled: 3-5 gen; milk yield (modern): 15-20 gen
